reviewText:
While looking for a replacement of our old copy,  i saw one solitary and negative review and was truly surprised.  I love the storytelling  of this gentle and imaginative introduction to the history of the Festival of Lights. i highly recommend it and wish it was available on dvd to give a copy to each of our five sons who have grown up with it as part of our family celebration.
Angela
Looking for a show to teach my 5 year old, this was an utter failure. I got it used for $1.99, and it was still a waste of money.
